title: 04/05/21 DPS Hour 2 Adam Morrison
itunes:title: 04/05/21 DPS Hour 2 Adam Morrison
description:
Adam Morrison tells Dan that his excitement during the Gonzaga game was just pure joy. Adam says that as the color analyst he was preparing for the next overtime and then the shot went in.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
